title: Observation
description: An observation is something that has been observed at a particular time and place. It is a subjective statement of 'I saw/heard this, here'

id.description: Unique value that identifies this element

version.description: Unique value that identifies this particular version of this element

created_at.description: RFC3339-formatted datetime of when the first version of the element was created

timestamp.description: RFC3339-formatted datetime of when this version of the element was created

userId.description: ID of the user who made this edit

links.description: Version ids of the previous document versions this one is replacing

schemaVersion.description: Version of this schema. Should increment for breaking changes to the schema

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the observation (e.g. location precision, altitude, heading)

refs.description: References to any nodes or ways that this observation is related to.

id.description: ID of the element that this observation references

attachments.description: media or other data that are attached to this observation

id.description: unique ID that identifies the attachment

type.description: string that describes the type of the attachment

tags.description: User-defined key-value pairs relevant to this observation
